item.description:
Come Join me for the 6th Annual Rock n' Rib Fest for great food and entertainment on the beautiful and spacious grounds of Anheuser-Busch. This family-oriented event will feature nationally renowned professional ?ribbers? and local award-winning restaurants providing mouth-watering ribs for everyone to enjoy. Add great entertainment for and you have a recipe for fun and excitement. As the official New Hampshire State Barbecue Championships, you will experience some of the best grillers and BBQers in the northeast vying for title of New Hampshire Barbecue Grand Champion.

http://www.rotaryribf...

Entertainment:

SATURDAY - JUNE 21st

Project Mess - Rock 'n' Roll 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM

The Risen - Rock 'n' Roll 3:00 PM - 6:00 PM

Brickyard Blues - Blues/Rock 6:30 PM - 8:30 PM

James Montgomery Band - Blues 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM

http://rotaryribfest....

2008 Ribbers:

T-Roy's Barbecue - Amherst, NH - 2007 People's Choice winner

Smoken Dudes Smokehouse - Croyden, PA - 2005 People's Choice winner

Gator BBQ ? Ontario, Canada

Big Moe's M&M Ribs - Boston, MA - 2006 People's Choice winner

Stickyfingers - Providence, RI

Aussom Aussie BBQ - Sydney, Australia

Rasta Joe's BBQ - Plymouth, Indiana

Dave's Famous Bar-B-Que - Manchester, NH

http://rotaryribfest....

Cost:
$5; Children under 8 are free

Carpool location:

We will meet at the Nashua Rest Area and welcome center at exit 6 in Nashua. Look for Robert.

Note: We are doing this event with the Greater Nashua Restaurant of the Month Club.
item.name: Rock'N Rib Fest, Anheuser-Busch
